title: Maple Sap Flow Prediction
summary: Full-stack web application that analyzes 500K+ geospatial datapoints to forecast maple sap-flow windows, built using a Python data pipeline processing 20+ years of time-series data from NASA Earth Engine APIs.

bullet_points.text: Developed full-stack web application analyzing 500K+ geospatial datapoints to forecast maple sap-flow windows, winning BramHacks 2025 ($400 prize) through effective data storytelling and visualization

Built Python data pipeline to process 20+ years of time-series data from NASA Earth Engine APIs, implementing feature engineering, trend analysis and normalization algorithms to generate training data for predictive models
Developed rolling-window inference engine using historical data analysis, reducing prediction noise and improving temporal stability by 40% through statistical modeling techniques
